text: This was given to me as a gift years ago and I have since tracked it down and reordered a few times.I recently ordered the citris one too,as it was cheaper,it is not as good... I think it is missing something,cannot figure it out ...but still delish!

Since Margaritas taste incredible but so are the calories,I decided to buy this to test it out.Granted,this will not make your Margarita taste even close to the ones you get at a bar,but at least you will like it.It is kind of strong,so a little amount can go a long way.Salud!
Great product from great people!
Was a crowd pleaser on Cinco de Mayo!

It is great to have an energy beverage that is truly healthy and free of unnecessary additives.It replenishes the body better and faster than water.After working out,I head straight for the Zico in my refrigerator!
Quality product as described.
good,but with a bit of an aftertaste
A great product for replenishing electrolytes.Much better and no sugar like Gator Aide type products.

I have used this product before and its good; just knowing that I am getting the protein,vitamins,and minerals that I need at a significantly better price than buying it in the store is good enough for me.
My preferred morning breakfast now,just add some milk and you are good to go,tastes great and is good for you!
I really like this shake not only does it taste great it gives me a lot of energy..highly recommend it
I really like this product.It does give me an energy boost and the ingredients are really good.I especially love the fact that the ingredients are organic and non gmo.
It blends well with juices and tastes great.It seems to be getting harder and harder to find though.I do tend to drop weight when I start my day with this energy shake.

This product is amazing!It tastes great mixed in water and if you add O.J.it is like an orange cream pop!I use this everyday as a meal replacement and it does not leave me hungry or needing another meal or snack until lunch.Must try it!

This seller offers a good price on a great product!We love this green drink,its the only way I can get my 4 yr old to get greens.Recomend making with almond milk and frozen banana for smooth texture.You can add other stuff too like plain yogurt,but that alone is good.
I did not find this to have a very strong hazelnut flavor as compared to the Torani syrup.I also have to use more of it than the Torani syrup.
clearly monin is serious about their productstheir flavor selection is immense even though everyone taste differ slightly..i recommend giving this a try

This flavor is superior to Torani,and supposedly not as cancerous as Torani Hazelnut syrup; it appears to be true that sodium benzoate along with citric acid contained in Torani does create benzene,which is considered cancerous.On top of that,Monin tastes better,I AM GOING TO.Looking forward to Vanilla next!
I love these Monin syrups.I use 1 Tablespoon in my double espresso shot lattes.Please read their website about expiration dates once opened,especially if you use a pump device
Same thing most coffee shops use.Yummy
Great Hazelnut Flavor Love it in my coffee every morning!
I like a more intense hazelnut taste.SO i need to use more but then its too sweet.

This is NOT the pure black cherry that used to taste good.Look at the new reviews.Do not be disappointed like we were.Did not discover it until it was too late and we had opened it later.The good reviews are from when it was a totally different product....tap the Latest First button on Amazon when you look at the reviews.I am only taking the time to help fellow shoppers...wish someone had warned me.

As far as i am concerned,it is false advertising,the lable says black cherry,100 percent,but look on the back ingrediants,its a mixture,ofa bunch of different fruits,not just black cherry,which I thought I was buying to help my gout,which it didnot help
By far one of the best we have tried!We use this in our water drinks,and diet milk shakes.It tastes like it should...GREAT!I already ordered two more!Would recommend and buy again!!!
Wife loves it

My mom has problem with her uric acid and this was causing lots of pain in her feet and legs.I bought this juice after researching what was good for her condition,she used it and it works like a miracle,she keeps drinking it just to maintain and she has nit had another episode since.I highly recommend this product.

After my boss told me to try cherry concentrate to help with my leg cramps I decided to give this product a try.I have to say it works!!Only thing is you have to take it everyday.Happen to miss a day and was up half the night with my usual leg cramps.I have not missed a day since and do not think I ever will again.Great product!
this worked well.not supposed to take with some other medicines,so I gave them to a friend works well
Product is good.When we received the shipment,the cap was broken.No broken glass.We were still able to use most of the juice.
This is a great natural remedy in preventing my husband gout from flaring up.He mixes a few tablespoons with water and drinks it two times a day.Thank you.
I drink this every day and never have to worry about gout flare ups.Make sure you shake the bottle before using,otherwise,it is very bitter.

I use this juice for miscellaneus aches and pains.I prefer this over having to take over the counter or prescription drugs because it is more natural.It does the job for me and if I take it at bedtime I can count on a good night sleep.

I decided to purchase this because the reviews I read,however,aside from the incredibly low price,this product has nothing more to offer.It is very chalky tasting.I can still taste the bitterness of the powder when blending with fruit and yogurt for a smoothie.Disappointing
I use this brand of protein powder,it does not have that gritty taste other brands have

I LOVE THIS PRODUCT....IT IS DEFINITELY THE BEST.ESPECIALLY IF YOU ARE DOING A LOW CARB DIET LIKE MYSELF!IT IS DEFINITELY SOMETHING I RECOMMEND EVERYONE WHOM ASKS ME WHAT PROTEIN POWDER SHOULD THEY USE.AND THE TASTE IS GREAT!
I actually bought this at Kroeger and this protein does not blend well at all like other protein powers.I usually make fruit protein shakes and this clumps up.Would not recommend.

I really like this product.I have the vanilla one too and use them both in my smoothies.I wish it was a bit stronger in flavor because when I mix with fruit it gets a bit overpowered,but its still great.
This is a great tasting product!I love putting it in my smoothies.Does not have that weird aftertaste like some protein powders.
Great product..tasted horrible you must make in a fruit smooth to hide the taste
This is great stuff really tastes good good quantity of protein per serving.
I have tried many protein mixes and have found none better than Spiru Tein!I mix it with fruit juice,before adding a few berries!

A little on the sweet side but still good.I use 2 scoops and I use this to build muscle like a protein shake.Over all pretty happy,but I do have to say I wish Natures Plus would stop using soy.The consumers do not know where it comes from and soy tends to weigh heavy on the stomach causing bloat.I think I will try their soy free products this time.
I like this product.We use it to make a protein shake in the morning.Very satisfied.
Gotten fatter,and not to much noticeable energy.

I love spirutein,it is my go to protein shake and meal supplement.It wakes me up in the morning and keeps me awake throughout the day.Also,I feel like I have more energy throughout the day if I take it in the morning.It seems to sit on the stomach nicely.The taste of this protein powder is great,better than any other powder I have ever used.I highly recommend it.
I had this in a Mexican restaurant and it was DELICIOUS!It had an amazing lime flavor and was bubbly.A must buy.
I just tasted this sangria in the small bottle version and let me tell you it has a unique flavor very very good its like a mix between sangria and a welch grape juice
did not magically transport me to the magical land of mexico,but was an agreeable drink none the less.
Let me say this.Sangria wine this is not.As a really good non alchoholic drink it is.
We were thrilled to find this on Amazon.We thought we could only get it at our local Mexican restaurant.

Just bought this for 75 cents at dollar general mart and it is smooth.The orange is sweet and light very unique.The sugar is not like let us say Mountain Dew.I mix the two half and half for a one of a kind drink that is fantastic.I will be buying many more of these orange jewels from Mexico at my Dollar Mart.They also carry the fruit punch variety.

It is an easy product to like for many reasons.Most importantly; it goes well if you want mix with other energy sources,is not too sweet and thus getting slimy,and in my view good value for money considering that you want something that works all the way.
Its a very decent tasting electrolytes replacement drink.

Best hydrating drink I have found to keep me getting low on electrolytes.I use this to keep hydrated on bike rides of up to 100 in south Florida.Despite profuse sweating for hours,using this I no longer end up with cramping.

This stuff is amazing for heavy sweaters!Has fueled me through ultra and Ironman training both back in the Southern US and here in balmy,muggy,equatorial Singapore!I even use it to supplement my hydration on normal working days in the clinic.
Aside from Smart Water,Nestle Pure Life is the best bottled water you can buy,in my opinion.But you can buy it cheaper at Walmart.
Decent flavor as water goes
Great product easy process
No more waster water bottles!The Nestle Pure Life 8oz.pack is the perfect size for kids to drink water.The bottles are small and convenient to pack in my kid lunchboxes.Good purchase.
Price is better in local grocery.I got suckered in with free trial.
Shipping was super fast,which is great.Everything was as expected,except the flavors.They were horrid.They were as listed,but drinking them made me sick..

I am so happy with this product!It is hard for me to find places in my upstate NY area that sells bubble tea and I am so happy to be able to make it at home whenever I would like I personally think the ones I made are better than the tea from local cafes because they never tend to cook the Boba thoroughly enough.Problem solved!
I purchased so many little packages at Asian markets before and realized I been having so much of it that cannot pay enough.Looked up here and found a good deal.Tastes the same as what I had.
perfect boba
Easy to prepare and delicious.Great deal!
This is my favorite hot choc mix EVER.BUT these prizes are crazy.You can get it for $3 6 at Ocean State Job Lots,Christmas Tree SHops and or your local grocery stores.
I bought this to use with my Back to Basics CM300BR Cocoa Latte Chrome 32 Ounce Hot Drink Maker and it makes a decent cup of hot chocolate.Nice chocolate flavor without being too sweet.
This is definately one of the best hot chocolate mixes on the market.Very creamy and the chocolate taste does not get lost in the sugar taste.A real treat!
Very delicious,deep chocolate flavor with about half a table spoon of mix.I especially like mixing it with almond milk.

I was turned on to this brand about 15 years ago,and I have not stopped buying it since.It is priced higher because it lasts longer.It is strong coffee,but never bitter.I make it with two heaping spoonfuls in a French press,and a little half and half.Glorious.
Smooth coffee,great flavor highly recommended.Cannot get this in Ohio,wish we could.
This coffee is one of best drinking coffee I think is,i use half the amount of coffee and get a good cup of coffee.
Love the flavor!Shipping was fast.
excellent chickory flavor
It is weak on the chicory not like I remember from years ago.
Love this coffee...actually I like it black,and it makes a smooth cup at half the regular amount of coffee used.The chicory takes out the bitterness that some coffees have.
Our favorite coffee for over 34 years.We started drinking this coffee when we lived in New Orleans,after 8 moves we still find or order it wherever we live.
Best coffee
have used luzianne coffee my entire life.do not use their recipe when making your coffee,start with one half the recipe and adjust to your taste.
cannot buy it locally,love this coffee!
My 80 year old Mother loves this stuff but can no longer buy it in our town.
Best coffee ever strong enough yet smooth tasting.
Product is as advertised

Smooth and rich taste as always,this brand never disappoints.I have been ordering this coffee brand ever since we left Atlanta over 22 years ago.I strongly recommend this coffee brand and this company,they are fast.
I would rather by the 4 pack for the same price
I love this coffee.Of course I love the chicory in it.Great buy!
I enjoy Luzianne coffee very much as I like the taste of it
I would heard it recommended for coffee drinkers for years and finally tried it.Sorry to say,I did not taste any difference in my coffee.My roommate tasted no difference either.
I chose this product as a gift and they really enjoyed it!They wanted a product that would help with digestion and chicory does that.

This is a nice mix for anyone who loves the taste of coffee with chicory but does not have easy access to it.I mix it with a blend that I buy in Italy where I now live and it really gave my coffee a wonderfully mild taste,even my daughter liked it and she never liked coffee with chicory when we lived in the US.I really recommend this product.Thanks!

Well I wanted to try chicory and I did.It is a bit too strong for my taste.I tried using less and it was still bitter.I have always heard that once you try chicory you will never want to drink coffee without it.That was not my experience though and I like my coffee strong.I think I have concluded that it is just not for me.Nothing against the product personally!

I really like the kick this chickory gives to my coffee.And I never knew of the great benefits of drinking chickory.It is very good for your digestive tract.I love the taste and I highly recommend you trying this product.It is great with tea too.
I liked it because it made my coffee taste better
I heard that chicory is supposed to make coffee less bitter,more smooth.I followed package directions,but did not notice any difference.Coffee was still bitter.Waste of money.
Chicory and dark roast coffee provide a perfect flavor.

This is much stronger,per measure,than coffee.When mixed with coffee as recommended use much less of the combination than you would of the coffee alone.I like the slightly mellower flavor,and until I bestir myself to dry and grind some chicory roots from my own yard,I will continue to use this.
I love the way this chicory product tastes in my coffee.I look forward to getting up every morning just to have a cup.
Good product.However,Community coffee with chicory works just as well and is less complicated to brew.
Wonderful enhancer for regular coffee.Use a teaspoon with my espresso or drip coffee.
Chicory gives my coffee a perfect balance.Love It.
Over priced

Mistakenly thought I was getting 16oz and not 6.5oz..This price point $28 lb makes this purchase of chicory the most expensive in the country!A little weaker than most other brands of chicory but definitely a rip off considering the price.

.I took the crappiest coffee ever,put some of this in it let it sit in there for about a week or so before using.The change was day and night.It took all the bitterness out of the coffee and made it taste like expensive smooth good smelling coffee.I found it pretty easily at one of the big box specialty stores in the whole foods section.they also have it at healthstores.It was very affordable for the amount of product I got.
This chicory is of excellent quality,and a worthy addition to fine coffee.
Somewhat bitter even though I mixed with coffee and that is what I was trying to avoid.Going To continue to experiment with ratio of coffee vs chicory.
Intend to approximate the intense coffee drinking experience I learned to enjoy in France.

Noticeable difference?Not so much.It claims to give coffee a smoother taste,but I did not notice anything.At least it did not make the coffee any worse,but those looking for a significant difference using this stuff,you will probably end up let down.

This stuff is great,it adds a flavor that is related to licorice mint pepper..some savory,some spicy,some minty for a coffee pro,you are likely drinking coffees that totally stand on their own,this additive can create particularly complex tasting brews.for average coffee drinkers,this adds an exciting additive to brews that are otherwise bland tasteless.highly recommend

I am a retired truck driver by trade.I enjoy my coffee extra bold,dark roast coffee.I discovered this product in my local grocery store.I did exactly what the instructions said,to mix the entire 6.5 oz contents with one pound of my favorite blend of coffee.I discovered that I use HALF as much coffee in my Mr Coffee machine and am VERY pleased with the flavor.This product,in my humble opinion,was a great find.
Yuch.Just my opinion of chicory in general.
Did not like as much as I remember the Chicory of my youth.
It was so good.I am all out.I have got to get more.It made my coffee very smooth.

Ground Chicory Root a New Orleans Louisiana Favorite originally was a Coffee substitute.However it was also found to enrich the flavor of a medium roasted coffee like the A and P Eight Of the clock Brand.
Always love having this in my coffee
Love me some Luzianne

I was using the Luzianne premium medium roast coffee chicory for my morning cafe au lait and got addicted to the really nice flavor.Tried the dark roast version instead but did not notice all that much difference and since the price of the dark roast is higher Amazon and other suppliers I switched back to the premium medium roast.

Ever since my wife found this coffee in the Mexican food section of the supermarket we have loved it.She drinks the decaf.Both coffees do not taste at all like instant coffee.We even take a small jar with us when we travel so we do not have to use the packet stuff they give you in the room.Nestle should really promote this coffee to the general public!!
I first saw these in a Rural King grocery store.My friend recommended it to me.I tried it and bought some more.I think this one and cinnamon coffee cake were the flavors I bought.They are both tasty.
Very good flavor

It was a Christmas present for my sister,it arrived just in time.Taste delicious as she did make a pot of coffee to share.Glad I was able to locate it to give to her.Price was reasonable,quality was great.
This is the very best coffee and the only thing my hubby can drink without getting an upset or acid stomach he loves it!!It is so smooth

I first tried the Sampler Black Mountain and all the coffees are excellent but the Hawaiian Kona Blend is the best.I also like the fact that the coffee comes in individual packages.The coffee stays much fresher that way and it is more convenient than grinding beans.
This flavorful coffee is one of my favorites...It does not have that perfume like taste that some flavored coffees have....
The coffee did not have a natural flavor and I threw it away after one brewing.Trying a coffee was a gamble,it was a waste of money.

After trying a small portion of the huckleberry coffee,I had to buy the larger size.If you do not like flavored coffee,then skip the Huckleberry.If you savor the aroma of a flavored brew,give the Huckleberry a shot.It smells wonderful and tastes even better.It is not as acidic as other brand coffee.It is definitely unique and a great gift for anyone who goes for something different.
We received a 2 oz pkg for a gift.This is one of the most smooth,non acidic coffees we have ever tasted!
As my Mother in law says MT is Gods country I know they know how to make huckleberry coffee good..Great Job and price with Fast shipping

I love huckleberries and luckily,the first huckleberry coffee I tasted was wonderful!!Usually I do not like flavored coffee,so huckleberry coffee is an exception.Unfortunately,some I have had after that have been disappointing after the first delightful one I tasted.This one did not disappoint,and I am so glad I ordered it!!Highly recommended for any coffee lover that wants a different,delicious flavor!!
Great product.I highly recommend for any coffee lover.I frequently order this coffee and have always been pleased with it is freshness and quality.
Good strong huckleberry smell when opening the can and good strong huckleberry taste once the coffee was brewed.Great product!

BOTH cans were damaged.I KNOW it is to be expected,not everything perfect.HOWEVER one can had three dents and one can had two dents.I do not have an option to contact seller......HOPING that they take time to read this to give me back at least $5.00 for the damage.
The coffee is delightful.
We are hooked on Huckleberry coffee!Love this stuff!
This coffee is sweet and so tasty.We had our first experience with huckleberry coffee when we went to yellowstone and are now addicted.

Was out in Yellowstone and purchased huckleberry coffee in one of the Park stores.Delicious!Ordered this and was not disappointed.Flavor was distinct without tasting fake and the coffee smell was very pleasing.Love it.
This is the best coffee in the world smells good,tastes good,delivered quickly!
Great all year coffe.
Excellent coffee.
smooth and tasty
Tasteful,you totally taste the huckleberry strongly and the smell is fabulous.

I purchased this as a gift and she loved it.She said the flavor was strong so she mixes in a little bit of this with her regular coffee grounds and it lasts her a long time.Such a great way to mix up your typical morning coffee.
Smells good with the feeling of being in Montana but not the best coffee but it is good and the only huckleberry option.
Best coffee ever
I love this Huckleberry Coffee.I had it the first time in Montana.This is the best brand of the one I have tried.Just have to be careful and not make it too strong.
It is ok.There are other products more expensive but of better quality.So what i am trying to tell you coffe lovers out there,is that you get what you pay for.
Nice flavor,not overpowering or artificial tasting.Will buy again.And again!
LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS COFFEE!!
I absolutely love this coffee!!!especially later in the day.Always delivered on time and fresh
Great coffee.Had this coffee when I recently traveled to Missoula,Montana.I highly recommend it.Great flavor!!Jackie H Orlando,Fl
I purchased this as a gift.My best friend father love this coffee.Shipping was surprising fast for a non prime item.
Good coffee,gave as a gift.
This coffee is delcious just the right flavor of huckleberry and the cost is very reasonable I highly recommend it!

I loved this product and to make it go further we used half hucklebury and half regular coffee.I will definitely be ordering again as the flavor is not like any I have tasted before.We had it at a small party and everyone seemed to enjoy it.thank you.

If you have ever had this coffee you will understand why I rated it 5 stars.I was also impressed with receiving the package promptly and the extra care given to the product to make sure no damage would occur.My mother was very pleased to be able to have her favorite Montana coffee back and we will definitely purchase from Huckleberry Haven,Inc.again.

Had huckleberry coffee for the first time this summer while visiting Glacier National Park.Immediately bought a can to bring home.Have had to restock since our return in mid August.French Vanilla creamer adds a nice touch.

I am new to Huckleberry but fell in love with it when I visited Montana.I have been trying everything huckleberry I can find.This coffee does not disappoint.I am certainly not an expert but,to me,it has very good huckleberry flavor.I am thoroughly enjoying this coffee.
Great coffee!I am a flavored coffee drinker and this is great.Fruity taste that reminds me of my Yellowstone trip.
Great taste.First coffee that has an honest blueberry taste.

I absolutely LOVE the taste of this coffee...especially when paired with a chocolate creamer.At first I was going to save it for special occasions,but now,I decided any day is special with Wild Huckleberry!
Love the crisp tang of the berry,find it great to add to my ground coffee.
I had a little sample can of this coffee from Yellowstone and LOVED it.Glad I could find it online
The smell is delightful.The flavor is bitter.The ingredients are not all natural.
BEST COFFEE ON EARTH

I had bought a souvenir 4oz bottle of this exact brand of huckleberry coffee on a whim at a Yellowstone park gift shop in August 2017.I am not a fan of flavored coffee but the little that I tasted,it was good enough for me that I bought two of this larger package.I surprised even myself liking flavored coffee!
Arrived amazingly fast!The taste is bitter like coffee,with a barely sweet after taste.Took some getting used to,but not to bad.
Great alternative to coffee
Great tasting chickory that I use to make in a variety of herbal teas.Excellent quality as well.
Good stuff.I cut it 50 50 with coffee to make my coffee healthier
NOT non dairy,it has milk products in it.I am so glad I read the ingredients prior to consuming,but they were not available on the Amazon ad.
Creamer,put it in your coffee it works.
This is the same old,same old.It is ordinary non dairy creamer made with partially hydrogenated soybean oil.It is NOT a soy milk or soy powder product.
Perhaps they have confused products and descriptions,but this is NOT soy.
My wife loves this tea.
What is not to like?Best chai tea on the market,bar none.
good quality

I am drinking this tea since 2013,so I do not know how the previous version of this tea tastes like,but among all the current available flavors of Tazo this is the best!As you cannot compare apple with oranges,this tea cannot be compared with Nilgiri mountain tea which is very strong and dark rather it is a medium spiced tea with cinnamon aroma.At times I add little bit ginger for aroma and to alleviate my sore throat and cold.
I cannot stand Oprah,but her chai tea tastes better than this one.But this one is much cheaper.Sorry,Oprah.

Tazo Chai is still the best out there,and this IS a good price for the multi pack.BUT...There is always a but.The other reviewers are right in that Tazo has changed the formula.Most of the spices are weaker than it used to be,all but the star anise,apparently.The batch that I got this last time was really minty tasting.Not up to their usual standards,I am sad to say.
Very sad disappointment!Almost NO chai spice taste,only black tea!Not spicy at all.I feel like throwing the whole box in the trash.
Good quality n flavor teacher

So sad,Tazo was the best Chai out there in my opinion.Starbucks ruined it.What is worse is they lie about changing anything with this tea.Really?I drank this tea EVERYDAY FOR YEARS,and so did ALOT of people.You cannot fool us not worth it anymore.
very tasty with milk
Speedy delivery!As described!Thank you!!

I was extremely surprised when I saw 4 stars and then I noticed that recently they changed the flavor and since it has gotten one to two.I purchased this at the store recently and I am no tea connoisseur,but this was the worst tea I have had.Bland is the only way I can describe it,it tasted like water with the slightest hint of cinnamon.I guess Starbucks wants everyone drinking teavana tea from now on.

This is some of the better packaged chai I have drunk.As others have commented,it is a bit weak,but I tried two bags to a mug and it was pretty good.I just wish it was a little more heavily spiced.My all time favorite of this type of tea is by Lupicia,but it costs a bit too much with postage.So I will be content with this.
We purchase this tea for the office as it is a favorite here.Wonderful flavor!
I love the flavor of this chai tea.I drink a pot of it a day.
The best Chai I have tried.Perfect blend of spices.

I really like this tea,as it has great flavor,but I have stopped buying it since the price went from $22.97 for 4 boxes in June up to $41.97 currently.Are you kidding me?!Almost double the price?Trader Joe Rooibos Chai tastes as good,and is currently around $22.I am sticking with that until Amazon comes to their senses and lowers the price again.
Has absolutely no flavor.Tastes like I am drinking hot water with a dash of cinnamon.Really disappointing.I have had this exact product before and it was immensely flavorful.I do not get it.
This chai tea is really good.I can buy at Whole Foods but I like that I can order a 24 count at Amazon.I recommend this product.
Great deal.Wonderful tea,not too sweet with a hint of pepper.
Nice blend of tea and herbs.Tazo usually has the best tea you can buy in a bag.
love this stuff!

Fabulous product.I received some free from Smiley360,a sampling website that allows us to sample items for free and review them,share them with friends.I have never had this product or tea before and I LOVED THIS!The Caramel Vanilla Chair filterbag is my favorite.Perfect for fall CA weather.Buy any of the Chair from TAZO,you will not be disappointed.
Got it free from Smiley360.Was not a fan of the Indian spice flavor of chai.If you like this sort of flavor ten you would really like this tea.
Tazo Chai Tea is the best Chai Tea.I have tried many different Chai Teas.Most of them taste like cinnamon tea.Tazo Chai tea is the best.The flavor in this tea is much more then cinnamon.
Great stuff!

I have switched to Chai tea in the mornings now as I am fighting cancer and coffee is no longer good for me too acid.I do appreciate the rich herbal flavours,however I feel like a more common brand is better tasting and organic as well
Just the best tea ever made!!!!
The chai tea is amazing I am an avid chai drinker and have tasted quite a few packed chais this one has great taste,smells good and is refreshing

I am a member of a focus group called smiley360 and was chosen to be a part of the Tazo chai group.I am so happy and best part of all I am receiving FREE products.Plus this stuff rocks.Thanks again smiley and tazo for having me be a part.
The best tasting Chai around!It is Organic,which is great,but would love to see a filter bag that is not bleached white to go along with the Organic labeling.
Good product.Good price.
It would not be that bad but it has so much pepper in it.That is the only problem
love chai tea,for tea bags,it works
A pleasant tea.Subsequent shipments were not as aromatic.Or did I just get used to it?Consistency in a brand is important to me.I have ordered one more to be fair.
Came on time,just as advertised,my favorite tea!I will order this again as soon as I use it up.

I used to order this tea in bulk and have drunk it regularly for over three years.I did not expect the recipe to change when the design on the box changed.The new version is weak and tasteless.I will have to throw out my last order of six boxes.Now I am in search of a new brand.Of course Starbucks denies that the recipe was changed,but I cannot drink this anymore.Heartbroken.
Perfect Starbucks tea for at home,if you like the tea at the store you cannot go wrong with this.

This tea is so good great flavor and makes a large cup of tea.I sweeten with a spot of honey and use steamed milk.Why pay $5.00 for a cup of tea at you know who when you can have the same thing at home with little or no sugar.I buy four boxes at a time!
Been drinking this tea for years; then Tazo changed from 24 count to 20 count.Flavor also seemed to have weakened with the new formula.Bad move Tazo...I am ready to move on...

Just the right mix of spices with that excellent punch of pepper.Not too much clove which kills some chais.Nothing weak tasting with this formula,it makes a strong cup even with more than 8 oz of water.
This tea is delicious,I love it.And the smell in the house as it is brewing is awesome.f
Might be the worst tea I have ever tasted!Honestly I do not know how anyone could give this tea a positive review.Save your money!
Great tea and many more tea bags in the box.This is a really good deal and I highly recommend it.

This is the best Chai Tea that I can find.I have tried just about everyone on the market and I always come back to this.This particular product has a 24 count instead of the normal 20 count thus it makes a much better buy.If you are price checking then look it over.I am highly recommend.
I do not drink tea,but my wife does.She loves this Tazo Chai.It is very easy to prepare per the instructions.
Good tea but not as good as the liquid concentrate version.Consider adding some of your own spices if you like your chai with a bit of bite.
Great tea.Great spicy flavor.Good for hot or iced tea.If you like chai,you will love this one!
Tastes great and I use super large cup and two bags,steep 5 minutes and add milk and sweeter.Great anytime
I have tried lots of spiced tea,but this one is outstanding,there should be green tea version of this too.

I have tried a lot of bagged chai tea and this one is my favorite.I drink a lot of tea and do not have the time patience to deal with loose leaves.The flavor is great and one teabag is more than enough for my 20oz mug.
I enjoyed the original recipe.I find the new formula packaging unappealing and returned it when I realized there was a difference.
Great!I do not mind rating products,but putting requirements on the wording and title makes it very bothersome.I can sum it up in just a few words.
hard to find in local stores.flavor is the better.has a smooth taste and is so relaxing.good black or with a splash of milk
I jumped on the opportunity to get this awesome deal.Priced so that it can ship by itself.I will be ordering this again.

I am from India and absolutely love Tazo Chai.It is a very spicy strong tasting tea that is perfect with milk and sugar.It is the only tea I will drink and is available at Starbucks.The Amazon price is good.I cannot find this tea in stores except at Target so I order from Amazon Prime.Love my Tazo Tea!

I love the starbucks chai tea latte,having this Tazo tea at home allows me to get that great taste I love at home.I really enjoy the money I save by making the drinks at home but I do not have to compromise on how perfectly balanced spices are.
I absolutely love this tea and have enjoyed it daily since I received it.I would recommend this product to anyone who has ever paid high prices for this tea in specialty shops,enjoy it at home.

My favorite way to relax each evening after a long day of work is a cup of Chai.Decaf in the evening.Full strength if I opt for a cup during the day.I usually purchase the six pack because my college bound students steal a box on the way out each semester.Sometimes a box makes a nice add on treat as a gift.
As soon as you peel the wrapper and get a smell of this tea you know you are going to enjoy it.it is a very nice tea to enjoy anytime.Great product.Thank you!
This tea is very balanced and delicious!The combination of spices is quite enjoyable.The tea works great in both hot and cold brews.

My wife and I are big fans of hot morning drinks with caffeine ,especially in the winter.We realized this to be a great way for us to get our morning fix more affordably from home.It is been about a year now and somehow this flavor tea has not gotten old yet!

I love this tee.I steep two bags for about 6 minutes in the boiling water,and add local honey.After i steep it,I add soy milk.Or I pour it over a tall glass of ice,and the soy milk.It taste so good hot or cold.

I have to agree with most of the other reviewers,this is the best black tea spice blend you can find.My problem is with Amazon pricing it very close to retail price even if you are buying in bulk.I would rather pay little more and pick up a fresh box every month.I have even found them on discount in mid town nyc store.So I am not too eager to stock it from Amazon.
I still do not understand why this was so cheap.It is the exact product that I pay more for on the shelf,with less tea bags.Great purchase.
Arrived in good shape.Good value for money.Local Publix costs 1.50 more per box.So all in all a good purchase as it saved money,time and gas in purchasing from local store.
Perfectly proportioned and very generously bagged.The strongest tea on the market.Powerful,tasty,energizing.The most addictive chai tea ;
Nice mellow tea for all occasions.I am an ex coffee drinker searching for an alternative and this product fit nicely.It is smooth,very satisfying.Nice product.

Do not pay $9.09 for this tea.You can get it for $3.54.If you cannot get it for that price at Amazon,go to vitacost.com I received the wrong tea.I ordered Tazo Organic Chai,but got Om with peach and cucumber,which sounds disgusting

This is simply put the best spice Chai tea you can get easily in the US.Hints of licorice,cinnamon,cardamom,and cloves mix well with steamed milk for a fantastic Chai latte you can make at home.Great before bedtime,or as a digestive aid,Tazo Chai is well worth the purchase.
Very nice chai.Good,but way overpriced.
You cannot go wrong with Tazo.Great product,taste like Chai should.
Delightful flavor.Tastes almost as good homemade tea made with fresh ground spices.Some other Chai teas combine green tea with black tea which I do not like.Good strong bouquet.
A boxed shipped in a manila envelope.What could go wrong?

I received a box with 20 tea bags not 24!I would like what I ordered and paid for.I was home the day it was supposed to arrive but not the next 2 days.A friend picked it up for me.She was supposed to have 12 bags.But when it was opened there were not 24 but only 20 and not the box shown above.Please correct this.
One of my favorite teas
so so....not the best Chi for the money.
Love this hot or cold,great drink.
My husband and I did not enjoy this tea at all.Not sure what we expected but it was not this.I think the lotus must have been too much.Not a fan,sorry.
Good flavor
This brittle was disappointing.It had no butteryness or depth of flavor.The taste is bland just sugar and peanuts.
Way too sweet and hardly any peanut flavor
Peanut brittle.C mon anyone without an allergy loves peanut brittle.
not enough peanuts.will not buy again
I think this bag lasted two days.And I did not share with my husband or kids.Amazingly addicting!Soft and chewy.If they were chocolate covered I would be in a diabetic coma.
My husbands favorite candy.
delicious great value
I am absolutely addicted to these...nuff said.But besides the point,if you can find this in a retailer it will be much cheaper than purchasing it online here.Otherwise,the chocolate is just amazing.
Came from Ireland and were incredibly delicious compared to the American ones.
I ate 10 boxes in a month.2 I gave to my mom and she ate them in a week.I need to get more.
Thought it would be better...the chocolate was not very good,the strawberries were tiny.

These are not fresh strawberries.They are OK,but not worth the $28 you pay.They have a chewy,gummy worm consistency.I ate two of them and threw the box away.The chocolate was good,and the seller is great.

Do not be fooled.I gave these to my husband for Valentine Day and there is no alcohol in them at all,let alone brandy!They are falsely advertised and a ripoff.We both tried them and then had some friends try them and we all agreed,no alcohol.There is also mo ingredient list on the box itself.You should be ashamed of yourself Scott for taking advantage off people!
Chocolate was too dense and the brandy made a mess
Very tasty white chocolate pecan bark.The large chunks of pecan nuts in the bark made a difference compared to other barks which had very small pieces of pecan in the bark.

This bark was good,but it was not as good as the white chocolate pecan bark.It seemed that the white chocolate bark had larger pieces of pecans in it compared to the milk chocolate.I prefer larger pieces of pecan nuts.
I order Virginia Diner Double Dipped Chocolate covered peanuts every year for my father birthday.I have never been disappointed in the product or service.This year was no exception.

These peanuts are addictive.You open the can and they just disappear.I really love them.Growing up in Virginia,it brings back fond memories of how everything in Virginia was sooo much better than anywhere else.
Very tastly and arrived early
These are broken pretzel bits.The box is not sealed and no care is put into the presentation of them.They also were stale.
One of my Dad favorites; could not believe the size of these but thoroughly enjoyed them.One of his favorite gifts.
These pretzels are absolutely delicious.Definitely gourmet quality.And they are not the wimpy little ones.It is a perfect combination of sweet and salty.I guess I was lucky.None of mine were broken.

Imagine my surprise when I opened my package containing 16oz of Chocolate Covered Espresso Beans chocolate goodness ,and instead found three bags of multi flavored jelly beans?!?Bummer.Amazon to the rescue to refund my order so I can place a follow up order.Hopefully I get it in time!
I really only have one word for these treats YUM!Got these for myself as a little treat and they rock as a little pick me up on the days I am tired or just need some chocolate.
Best value available.Delicious if you love coffee and chocolate.Made a great present for my sweety on Valentines day.

These coffee beans are fabulous.They came in a double sealed bag,the flavor is great,a good ratio of dark chocolate and espresso.There is no burned espresso flavor!There is a good amount of crunch to each bean.I will definitely purchase from this company again.

Ah,Wha Guru Chews!Where do I begin!In the early 1980s a friend turned me onto them,and ever since I grab them when I can find them.They are becoming hard to find though,even online esp.the Cashew Almond,which is THE BEST! I recently tried to find them again,because now that I have children,I want them to experience a Wha Guru Cashew Almond!
These are great option for those of us who cannot tolerate the chemical taste of many nutrition bars.delicious and healthy!

I am very pleased with this product.And you cannot beat the price on Amazon!They are a great snack on the go and gives me sustainable energy.It is all natural although I am not vegan,I appreciate that there are no refined sugars or flours in this or any Betty Lou products.I have tried the almond nut butter ball and was equally pleased.I look forward to trying more Betty Lou products.
Probably the best vegan treat I have had.Nice consistency and mouth feel.Packed with nuts,flavor and calories .
a great gift!
Its not the same in the picture.Its blue box and I do not like the chocolate
These are good.They really are.They Are just not as good as the ones from Sams at Christmas.But they are good.And addictive.
The price even with shipping was good.The chocolates are amazing!!

Great chocolate treat.Delightful milk chocolate with crushed hazelnuts,coating a whole hazelnut.Delicious...kind of reminds me of Ferrero Rocher but much tastier as the chocolate is creamier and the hazelnut is fresh and crunchy.Also comes with cute little love notes in each chocolate.What a delightful gift.
Excellent product.Rich dark chocolate with hazelnuts is always a hit in my family.Baci are hard to find.These small bags are great stocking stuffers.
This was a gift for a friend who said she enjoyed the chocolates.It made a nice gift after my trip to Italy.

These chocolates are absolutely delicious.When eating high quality chocolates,I generally prefer truffles from the local chocolatier,however,these are certainly perfect for an occasional treat.I bought these for my girlfriend and she absolutely loves them!If you have never tried Baci you are certainly in for a treat.
Tasted NOTHING like bacon.Bought as a novelty type gift but was still quite disappointed.Wasted my money.
VERY DISAPPOINTED!!I ordered 4 boxes of these and they did not taste like coffee and were sticky like they were OLD candy.I Am sorry I wasted my money on them..
If this is Coffee flavored...it is a very WEAK cup of coffee.No taste of coffee at all.I am out $5 dollars since I cannot return it.

Not quite the same as banana runts but I do enjoy the taste nearly as much.My only negative would be that flavor consistancy is not uniform.Sometimes you can get a banana head with a pretty strong punch.Still very happy overall.

We used these for my daughter jungle baby shower.Very cute and taste very similar to Runts bananas The bananas are smaller than Runts but were not broken like the Runts I ordered from another company who never bothered to respond to my disappointment

I had ordered these again I must say they are just as good as last time.I had tried another place because they offered 5lbs for the same price,however they were disgusting.These are so yummy,just like the runts candy that I had when I was little except all banana,yay!Thanks again for the speedy delivery and great product!
Cute,perfect addition to minion themed party.Taste just okay,not bad,just not too much flavor at all.Kids loved them.Huge sack.
These are awesome and taste just like the banana nerds!!!!I would deifintely recommend this product,they are really great!!!
These are my favorite candies,and it is so nice to have them delivered to my door.Love coming home to find a nice surprise on my porch.Fast shipping from this vendor.

We got this for my dad for Christmas a few years ago.Having the sophisticated palate of a six year old on Halloween night,banana runts are his favorite.It is one of the few gifts I have given him that he has actually enjoyed.The others being a video game and a roll of toilet paper.
I have ordered from a couple of places and these have the least amount of banana flavor..I am disappointed as this company had such good rating.
These are delicious!I do not know why I wanted 3lbs of banana candies though
Small in size but taste good.
I am so glad I was able to find,just the bananas for a birthday party game
The blow pops were stale and very old
These are trates I buy for the children on my school bus They love these as did my children when they were younger.
The best blow pops of all the blow pops.Also,they came quickly and have not found a broken one yet.So that is also good.
Great price!!Loved these since I was a kid!!Fast shipping!
These are just as I remembered from childhood.The box I received was as fresh as any I have ever had.Great purchase.
Soft in texture,and yummy gummy bears.
These taste so good and are so cute to put in a little gift basket or to have balloons attached for a little gift.I will be ordering more!
The little bears are adorable but I found them to be very sweet.A little less sugar and more huckleberry flavor would make these wonderful.
Fresh,yummy,fast shipping.
they were fresh,but the flavor was not what I had hoped it would be.
Bought for stocking stuffer and they loved it.
Very over priced.Unimpressed with flavor.Regret ordering this.

Buy candy,because you will need it for halloween.People can and ask for candy.I think it is a scam so you would by candy for children,invented by the candy company.However it is a very good holiday for remembering the dead.Anyway you should really think about buying candy,I am now prepare for halloween.You should too!!!

The best Mike and Ike flavors are the Tropical Typhoon variety which Amazon does not sell,therefore,the four stars.The blue candy is Caribbean Punch,but that is not in this bag; it is my favorite though.It is supposedly fat free candy,but you know how that goes.

These fruit slices are truly amazing.They have a taste that is surprisingly good.These candy fruit slices really taste like fruit.They keep well.They are not generally available in this part of the country and so are a real treat.
Finally,the properly awesome treatment of my licorice craving!! There is NEVER enough in the assortments!
Jelly Belly The BEST!
Very good.Have ordered 4 5 separate 2 and 3 bags already.Quick ship in bulk bags.
good value for a lot of beans!They tasted like described Black Licorice.
Very fresh and Yummy!
Great stuff.

I could bathe in these,please send me a bigger batch,the tub kept them fresh for a very long time.I do not care if I am an east coaster with a love for a west coast delicacy.There is a reason.These straws from heaven.
A item
It unfortunately tastes like medicine with a hint of chemical taste.Totally terrible..
To small

I had a craving for the assorted Tootsie Roll and found this barge bag on Amazon for a decent price.I was a bit skeptical after reading that some people got frooties instead.I did in fact get the tootsie rolls and they were chewie and delicious just like I remember.

So this was suppose to be an assortment of flavors,and while I can understand that it may not have equal amounts,I received two big bags and out of 3lbs there was a total of 8 cherry flavored pieces...not really an assortment at all!
This is THE best tahini.I have trouble finding it in markets,so finding a good,reliable,quick way to get it was a godsend.Do not buy second best,get this brand.
always have loved this tahini
Seemed a bit old but since we have never used Tahini before,maybe it was supposed to be vary hard on the bottom and oily on top.
I cannot seem to find this stuff at my local store so this is awesome.Great quality and it is nice to be able to make my own hummus.
This rice was moldy.
We love white rice but we mix this 1 part to 2 parts regular rice in the rice cooker.We love the consistency of the blend.Play with it with other rices of choice and enjoy.

I started eating rice when I found out that it is very good for your kidneys.It is very difficult to cook.You need to keep a watch on the pot.I find it excellent with some cinnamon and a little stevia in the morning for breakfast.It is a simple carb so you do not want to eat too much of it.But it is a welcome change for breakfast.
Worked great in zucchini brownies!Great deal!

One of the most foul concoctions I have ever had the misfortune to place upon my tortured tongue.Utterly revolting.This should be on the top of the list for interrogating terrorism suspects. And I do like some other unsweetened apple sauces.This had a sickening sweetness to it,with a not quite apple flavor.
I love everything apples.This is the best applesauce I have ever purchased.It even rivals some homemade applesauce I have had.If you like the taste of fresh apples with no nonsense,this is for you.

I was looking for organic apple sauce in glass and this is the only one I can find,BPA in other packaging.This sauce is very bland tasting,but I just added cinnamon and a pinch of salt and it was good.
purchased as gift for son and daughter in law lunches.plastic cup easy to open.they have spoken highly about the product
THE CHUNKS OF FRUIT ARE TOO BIG AND IT CONTAINS TOO MUCH MANGO.I ENDED UP GIVING IT ALL AWAY TO A FOOD BANK.
These fruit cups are just the right size for an adult.They have really large pieces of fruit.Plus,having the little fork under the lid helps to not make a mess.

These fruit cups are sooo good!They are just the right size too!They each come with a small fork under the lid which is really helpful on the go!They shipped quickly!I will definitely order them again!

The picture shows the original recipe so I rolled the dice in hopes I would get the original.Unfortuantely,the order showed up and it is the new recipe.ACK!Also,I got only one box like you would at the grocery store,yet it costs 3x what they charge at the store.
one of the best granola bars out ther...very impressed
So.Much.Chocolate.These are awesome!
My go to energy bars!

The whole family loves these.My toddlers love them and also my husband and myself.Every flavor is delicious.The texture can be somewhat weird at first to get use to but after that they are great.Great healthy snack for on the go.
I love these bars.They taste great and are very healthy.Great to keep on hand at work in case I do not have fresh fruit.

My friend made me try these.I love them.I hope they are healthy because I eat them a lot.I want to find out if these are available in stores too?Or just Amazon?It is only 100 calories,should not do any harm.The packaging was a big topic of discussion on some of the reviews really do not know what is the big deal about it.
Very delicious fruit bars,perfect for those who have limited diets.They have a great,chewy texture and a uniquely sweet flavor.Cannot get enough of these bars!
My 5 year old daughter was not too impressed w the taste so would not recommend these for young kids that are gluten free.
Delicious and not too sweet or salty.Perfect for the chocolate or peanut butter lover...neither flavor is overpowering
Yummy!Clean eating granola bars.
Good granola bar.Tastes mostly sinnamonish .
This product was exactly what I expected when I received in in the mail and matched the description on the website
Lots of protein,does not taste too bad,low suger,and does not feel like a brick in your stomach after eating it.Will buy again.
Product arrived on time and I have no complaints.Everything was great and I continue to order these on a regular basis.Taste great and really good pre workout.

i realize they are reduced sugar,which is nice,but they really do not taste so hot.the vanilla ones are much better but have more sugar .I would recommend buying other bars too,so you do not have to eat these every time.They are sometimes hard to finish. been eating these in place of p90x bars

I was very hopeful after reading the reviews but I am dissapointed after trying it for myself.The peanut butter crunch flavor had a weird texture of rice crispy meets sand.It seems stale.The flavor was terrible as well.Two stars is being generous.
I order these all the time.Great taste.
Good replacement for chocolate!
These are great and only 3 Smart Points on Weight Watchers!!Get some!
delicious and nutritious low calorie snack with chocolate!great price

An overly sweet snack which I found useful and pleasant for treating mild episodes of hypoglycemia because it had a mix of fast simple sugars and slower,more complex carbs.That was when it was $2.50 a box.But since the price has increased it is no longer a cost effective choice for me.Oh,well.It is not like it is something I cannot substitute for.
I just did not like the way these tasted.Very sort of commercial flavor
favorite bar
Healthy junk food,yum!
The case arrived in great shape and in a timely fashion.These crunchy corn snacks are like awesome vegan cheese curls.Delicious!
we were willing to try them to fill up our pantry box,but we did not think they tasted very good.
good gluten free snack.just wish it was organic or at least gmo free.My kids like them a lot.

The box arrived on time and in good condition.The outer box was sturdy and packed well inside was the manufacturer original shipping box of 12 in perfect condition.There is some cracker breakage,but not excessive.I doubt that some breakage during shipping can be helped because of the box being handled so much by the carrier.
Best to be sure you like this product before purchasing 12 boxes.Arrived promptly and with only a minor amount of breakage.

I have tried just about every cracker Whole Foods sells and this is my favorite one.I love the taste that is added with the roasted veggies.Many wheat crackers that are truly healthy have a dry kind of bland taste.Kashi figured out how to create a truly healthy cracker with a bit of zing.
They are basically a thick Wheat Thin.......I knew the flavor was familar,but I had to think about it for a minute.
I recommend better packaging as 4 out of my 6 chip bags were popped.Chips broke and everything.Still the same great flavor!

I bought a bag of these chips mainly to get to the $35 minimum required for same day delivery.I had never heard of this brand before but I found the chips to be quite tasty and they were fresh.I generally prefer kettle chips because I love the thicker cut if those and the crunch they provide.But for a thin cut classic chip these are really good.

Served them at my Book Club,where we were reading a book with a setting in Maryland yes,we had crab cakes too! .Everyone loved the chips and went back for seconds as we discussed our book of the month.My husband remembers eating Utz pretzels in Pennsylvania as a youth...best ever!
They are heavily seasoned but very addicting!I wish the bag was filled more than halfway.
Not near as good as I remembered them from Sam Club.Pricing and shipping outrageous.I will not be ordering again.

Meh...Shipping kind of ruined them.There was not much air in the bag; no padding at all in box with other items .Utz still taste good but I am glad I did not go out of my way to order.Probably will just pick up next time I head east .

These used to be my favorite.Unfortunately the manufacturer has changed the way they make the crisp.It is no longer puffy and thick but more like over baked cardboard...and who wants to eat cardboard?
This is a good product.Nutrition is not as good as nutrisystem soy chips,but is comparable.Less protein and higher calories.
Blue chips are the answer for anyone who loves their tasty,crunchy snack,but are restricted to salt content.This product provides a very tasty answer.NO SALT is the ultimate answer.Happy John

Do without the salt.These chips are great,and you can taste the excellent unique blue corn.This company is very savvy,so that these chips are also very healthful for other reasons.I eat some about every day.They are really irresistable,so I like the healthful aspect.Be careful not to eat too many!Regards,proclus ...
I cannot eat salt at all....so these chips are a life saver for me!I can still feel like i am eating chips and still be healthy my total drug of choice!
We love Terra chips and these are one of our fave flavors.A good alteranative to regular chips,they are also healthier for you.You also cannot eat just one!
Gift for a friend who loves them.

The blend of herbs and seasonings in this vegetable medley is really delicious.It is flavorful without being overpowering and is more than a little addicting.It is a great alternative to fried and greasy potato chips and I highly recommend this particular blend from this brand of veggie chips.
My kids has allergy of egg dairy wheat soy etc....but can eat this!!!!!
The product tastes great but the main ingredient is corn and we do not eat corn.I was bummed by this because there really is not a healthy gf animal cracker out there.
The cookies are great,just wish there was a better way in preventing broken cookies.They are perfect for that cookie craving.
Over priced.Head to an H mart if you can
NOT A SINGLE ITEM SIMILAR AS THE PIC!!!WAY OVERPRICED

Literally half of the package seemed to be hi chu candy and pretz.Also a lot of the candy such as the pocky and several packages of pretz were not in boxing,which resulted in packages of crumbs.A lot of the items as well seemed to be very common in the states,and are easily found at a regular grocery store.
A good varity
Yum.Great coffee dunker.
Love them,love them.Hard to find them.Always a light cookie,melts in your mouth.They have a wonderful anisette taste.
All of Pamela gluten free products taste great.The Almond Anise bisquits are my favorite.

I am very happy that Pamela Products makes gluten free biscotti.You would not even know they do not contain gluten.Recommend them highly to anyone liking a nice hard almond anise biscotti great for dipping into coffee tea.
First time I had this was in SouthAfrica and loved them.They are good for little snacks for people on the go.
Almost as good as the Muesli

These are good stuff.They are packed bulk,in one bag and not individually wrapped.The ones I had in South Africa were individually wrapped,which was more convenient.Nevertheless,they are a fine product and I do recommend them.
Love them quick service..

What is not to love about Nutter butters?I bought these for my daughter to pack into her lunches.They are very convenient for a single serve package and travel very well.You really do get 12 packs.I bought these at full price and they are not a review item
Who does not like Nutter Butters???Good buy the 12 packs each have 4 cookies in them.It is great if you only eat a couple of cookies every few weeks.Keeps the package from going stale.
Perfect for lunches and snacks.

the nutter butter was ok,and it came exactly as pictured,the only issue is that it kind of tasted like its been packaged on a plane truck and shipped to me.And i no that is what happened but that does not mean i want to taste it.Nevertheless,i ate the whole thing,because i sure as heck was not about to throw it out,since it was my money that paid for it.

These cookies are great,definitely nice to have when there is company...always a favorite.But I looked up the very same product elsewhere and it is only $3.49 at my local grocery store.Plus you have to pay shipping if you buy here?No deal. ...
These are the MOST delicious cookies available.I do not understand why they are so cheap!!Good value for such beautiful taste.

I box a case of these and treated some pumkin and ginger fans.One liked them a lot; most were indifferent.Taste is not pumkin spicy enough but ginger is nicely done.Some found fault with the texture neither crisp nor chewy.I would say they were a nice try but not a winner.

My sisters said that the flavors were wonderful,but many of the cookies were broken.When they picked up a cookie,it crumbled.I hope there is a way you can remedy this so that I can order from you again.
Had these delivered to my family and they raved about how wonderful the cookies are.Stayed very fresh during shipment YUM!
Really liked them!It was a nice surprise!My only complaint is that we got a variety pack,and all the flavors kind of melded...I would definitely order again,but get just one flavor.
This was a gift for a friend who had ankle surgery.He and his wife loved every cookie and did not stop thanking us.
my favorite kind
Arrived as promised,not a long shelf life though
got them for our poodle and she loves them
Great taste and Quality.Highly Recommend.
I love these cookies and set it up as a subscription.
VERY good cookie.A substantial cookie to eat on the run,esp.if you have not had breakfast.

If there ever was a healthy cookie this is it.The peanut butter and chocolate are not stronger flavored like Reese p nut butter cups but they do come through.It is moist and dense,not very sweet and pretty filling.Probably about the size of 2 large cookies stacked up.The chocolate is in chunks and not so many that it seems like a regular cookie.So no guilt to actually have it for breakfast sometimes.

A really high quality cookie with a delicate tang of blueberry and a slight buttery taste.Finely milled flour,so the texture is not coarse.Very,very nice.This brand is also sold at Ikea as a scandanavian type cookie and Amazon sale price is well below Ikea.
quality fancy ginger cookies
These cookies are so good you cannot eat just one.
the lightest,tastest ginger cookie ever.No weird after taste or worry about breaking your teeth to eat it.Yummy!
my mom can only eat gluten free,this is her favorite brand,all of their prodcuts are great!
good product and service.
now I can make my favorite desert!...well.my sister is making it for me.but it is nice eating something that everyone else can enjoy too!
If you are making tiramisu make it at least a full day ahead of eating 8 hours is not enough to soften the cookies

Ugh.I am not sure when this happened,but this product contains sugar.It no longer uses honey as its sweetener.I will not buy these again until they go back to the original ingredients.If you do not care about using refined sugar,please note that the product also tastes much sweeter than the old batches that were made with honey.
This is like a taste of heaven.I totally love the taste of it and the price is very reasonable.
Delicious?Great taste.Made with Love.I would recommend this product to other customers.Will buy those again.Mmmmm.
The only downside is that you need to hide them because they are packed full of calories!Great for gluten free diet!
Tasted Old and a bit stale.Not as fresh as my local Trader Joes....
it was expaired
Outdated and tasted stale.Crumbs and tiny shards of cookie.
Came promptly and well packaged,not a single biscuit broken.Have already used for entertaining holiday guests.
Very dry.
Yummy cookies.A little pricy,and small.But great tasting
MY NEW FAVORITE SNACK!I WILL REORDER WHEN ITS BACK IN STOCK
Healthy and awesome.
Fast Delivery Good Price Who Could Ask for anything More
Peanut Butter Satisfaction.
Always a great product.One of my two favorite cookies
Stale!Every one came crushed and broken
Showed up in crumbles!Have not opened them,so cannot comment on taste.The only thing they would be good for is pie crust.
Arrived smashed up.
These cookies taste better then others like them by a long shot.And they are organic.And company profits go to charities.Come on.What is not to like?Check them out.

I have a wheat allergy.These cookies are great.They do not taste just like oreos as they are wheat free and also not full of processed junk.Those looking for a healthier oreo but do not have to have a wheat allergy should look elsewhere.Those with an allergy will find that these cookies are pretty tasty.I have tried many wheat free oreos out there and these are the best that I have found
To be very honest these taste better than Oreo.I buy them frequently for lunches and snacks.Another organic food my family loves.
These butter cookies were borderline stale and arrived broken into many pieces.

The last 2 times I ordered this product I was very disappointed that the cookies were broken and some of them were not salvageable.I am not disappointed in the product but the inability to ship without damages.I probably will not order this product again.
as usual half the box were broken.
The cookies are excellent.However,the tin was bent,and every cookie in the tin was broken into little pieces.All 18.I was not going to throw them out.They are very good cookies.Delivery,not so much.

These usually come with a good long time before they expire.My mama loves these dipsy doodles and used to buy the multi variety packs just to get them.So she loves these giant box fulls.Especially bcuz she eats lightly and only occasionally with a sandwich etc.Thanks
Cannot find these in my area.One of my favorate snacks when I was growing up.
Packing was beat to hell
These are great.The size is perfect you can eat one or two and be quite satisfied.Beats the larger bags which makes you eat more in a sitting.A perfect snack for adults and children.

I have been looking for Krusteaz sugar cookie mix for years,it is so much easier than making from scratch and very close to being as good.I am excited to make my famous frosted sugar Christmas cookies!!!

I have purchased other Lebkuchen,and it has always been moist,tender,and delicious.I purchased this for my daughter Girl Scout Troop for their World Culture day to celebrate my daughter German heritage.These were just okay.A bit dry,a bit tough,not as tasty as the other,larger lebkuchen I have purchased in the past.
The cookies arrived in excellent shape and were fresh and tasty.They are a nostalgic part of our family Christmas and I was pleased to find them.
really good service terrific
every stick was broken,,made them useless for our recipe
Everyone loves these wafers.
Taste great but all broken into little pieces
Very tasty,wholesome snack that young and old love.I cannot keep them around long.It is nice to have the small pack to ration with the grandkids who do not know when to stop eating them.

These cheddar crackers are wonderful.My son has a bad reaction to artificial coloring and preservitives.These packs are the perfect size for his lunch box and car rides.They taste even better than the other cheddar fish cracker.

Travel with a toddler,heck,getting around with a toddler is all about the snacks.She loves these,they do not upset her reflux,and they are terribly convenient in this package to throw in a bag just in case. At home we use a regular box,but there are times you need to throw something in a bag and forget it.This works!
We only received one box of the 6 boxes of 6 1 oz snack packs and were charged $18.31.Very poor service.
The crackers are delicious....rich tasting,but not over flavored.My friends liked them too.
Not gluten free
These are awesome and taste amazing!
good basic crackers,but they do not ship well lots of broken ones

Good tasting snack.I though that the flavors would be alittle stronger...but still good.You really can not tell that there are sesame or poppy seeds on them....but I guess they are there.Very crispy and not at all salty.
I love these chips.They make you thirsty and probably would be even better with dip.My husband loves everything bagels but the chips will stay fresh longer than regular bagels would.
Who can live without Classico Bruschettinis?I treat myself over a long long period of years with this treat,cold snack,with all kind of sauces,bean sauce dip,spinach sauce dip a.s.o.Try it out!
Fantastic product and 100% whole grain Highly Recommended
I bought a case of the WASA Multigrain Crispbread.The product came on time and expiration date is 3 31 2018.Very fresh.

If you love crisp bread and sesame,you might want to eat this everyday.I know I do!I keep it fresh for a long time in a snap lid box,so having to buy 12 at a time is not a problem.Plus the price is much better than at the grocery store,where I have yet to find this flavor,incidentally.So much yummier that the rye flavor!
Great low calorie crackers.10 full size boxes for a terrific price.Will continue to order on Amazon as they are no longer available in the local grocery store.
Fast delivery.Good book.Love it!
Love these grahams sorry I did not know about them before.
The six boxes of crackers were bundled together and put n a much bigger box without any packing.This caused about half the crackers to be broken.The crackers still tasted good.
These are my go to treat.Just love them.

Good stuff to have on hand to use as a frequent replacement for bread.The crispness,sesame flavor,and non perishability are welcome elements,and the reduced carbs as compared to bread are an adjunct benefit!
Great crackers,nice sesame flavor
very fresh,tasty cracker.lovely with soup or stew.
Great taste.Wonderful for chili and creamy soup.At my door when they said it would be.Very happy with this purchase.

My mother grew up on the East Coast,but when she moved to the Midwest after marrying my dad,oyster crackers was she missed when eating chowder.I love to order these for her and ship them to her house.She loves them!

I grew up near Philadelphia with these oyster crackers crunched up in oyster stew,a cheap dinner during the Depression.As an adult I saw them on bars where you crushed them with your hands to split them and donned them with horse radish.Great with a drink!Now I am in Vermont and no one has ever heard of them.I get them from home .Keep them coming.Daisy
always enjoyed them just as a snack.
Best crackers ever!!
My favorite crackers in the world.Crispy and tastes great.
great cracker
Great eat,please buy this produce,highly recommended,individually wrapped,last long,taste great,great snack,fresh,not salty,great.
What more can be said than Yummy!!!Love these as a snack easy to pack and great to eat!
Exactly as I expected them to be.A great midday snack at work.
This crackers are so yummy!!I recieved 6 boxes 8 packs box for under $10,we will worth the money.They are just perfect for little ones and packed lunches.
Ty this product is for my daughter and I to share,they will last us quite awhile ty,,

Melba Toast is a great buy on Amazon.com.We had been buying it at the supermarket,one box at a time.We paid approximately $3.50 a box and on Amazon we paid $2.19 a box.We have opened 2 boxes and about half of the Melba Toast in each box had broken pieces.Amazon needs to put a label on the shipping box to handle with care.

I only purchased this for the HcG diet,I got the whole case of twelve boxes and used only two.It did the job as in I used it to snack on,but it tasted like I was eating a crunchy cardboard box.I guess I can feed the rest to the ducks.

I bought these as Christmas gifts to put in with a gift assortment.Most of my family love ginger and lemon.These cookies were great,nice and fresh,gingery and lemony.The packages are somewhat small but are nice for having a cookie or two with tea in the afternoon.Everyone has enjoyed these very much.
Too bad they are not low calorie.I think I have ordered around 20 boxes,but my wife gets them before me.
I really love these cookies.The ginger lemon taste is unique and a satisfying treat.The cookies are very crisp and cream filling is not sickeningly sweet like O R E O s.A great treat with hot tea....
A perfect cookie to go with a nice of cup of tea.The balance of ginger and lemon is perfect.The cookie is crisp not to hard.The package was perfect.No outdated cookies or broken or open packages.
Light,crispy and buttery,these are ideal little crackers to keep at hands.Great with cheese for snacking; with some fruits or a cup of tea,it is a delight for a break.
I love these crackers when they are fresh.Although delivery was fast,these crackers had a stale odor and taste.Disappointing!
We eat a box a week of these crackers,so ordering in bulk from Amazon helps us cut costs!And they deliver it to us monthly through subscribe and save!
These are my favorite crackers ever.I have had the pleasure of eating these for many years.The flavor is always fresh and the crackers nice and crunchy.Perfect cracker.
I LOVE POPCORN BUT HATE THE HULLS.THIS HAS A FEW BUT THEY ARE VERY SMALL.

All the kernels pop and the taste is so much better and more natural than regular supermarket brand popcorn.Just wish it was not so expensive.I will still buy again though because it is a superior popcorn.

It popped well and tastes fine,but it is not very fluffy,the flavoring is inconsistent,and it has a somewhat stale taste to it.Maybe that is the nature of this type of popcorn.We will try a different brand next time.
Great popcorn.
I was looking for some un buttered,but still salted popcorn.The stuff that is on this stuff is butter by a different name.While it tastes fine,it FAR FROM A HEALTHY SNACK.

This is my favorite popcorn!!!I eat popcorn about 3 4 times a week.It has the perfect flavor; a hint of corn,a hint of oil,and some salt.The salt seems to be very intense if you eat it straight out of the bag,but it is perfect if you dump it into a bowl when it comes out of the microwave.
This popcorn is delicious and healthy too!
Five stars for not using trans fats.Tastes pretty good too!
Great popcorn!!So much better than store bought.Never disappointed with Wabash products.Will try more products in the future.

These kernels are small so they take a few more to get a full popped bowl and cooked with extra virgin coconut oil results in supreme popcorn.Also there are very few hulls to get caught in your teeth; a plus.Not everyone would agree but the popped corn is more tender and delicate than larger corn.I think regular yellow corn is the worse does not come even close in quality and taste.
split bad and cost with 2 friends so made it more affordable little hulls if any great as I have crowns pops nice in my orville redenbacher microwave popper.
Popcorn was good but it was full of rocks and bugs.In order to use had to strain complained and was sent more and it was also full of rocks and bugs.Will not order from this vendor again.

I love jolly time white popcorn,but was looking for a non GMO popcorn since I eat a lot of it corn is one of the top 3 products genetically modified .Very happy and will definitely buy again I prefer the high price and knowing it is real food versus cheap and unknown!

I can eat a pound of these things in one sitting.These are top notch crackers.Since they are in 3 oz.bags,it keeps me honest and I do not eat my entire stock in a few days.Even better that these are organic and I get them at the non organic price.Thanks Amazon,keep these in stock please!

I get that Quakes are much tastier,but they are also full of bad additives.My son who has allergies to wheat and dairy,LOVES these!The taste is not overpowering or salty.It is a nice sweet snack from a great company.

Okay so I am totally about eating healthy and usually Hain products fill the bill,but these are just yukky.I got hooked on Quakes and thought I would find a healthier version of the same,but what I got a case! was something that tastes like wall paper paste and has the same consistency while chewing it.The rounds have a funny smell and an even funnyier meallic taste to them.Buy Quakes instead.
taste horrible and the company did not care.

If you like curry and indian food...you will LOVE this product.Its a bit too much for my taste buds,though.The other bag I bought was red bell pepper and those were delicious!!!!I would imagine these would go really well with a plain hummus.I gave the bag to a friend and they really love them.Will purchase again in the future...just not this particular flavor.

These chips are the best and they are gluten free and have protein.I discovered them at a local market and now I am sold.I carry them in my car for a filling,salty snack.They are so much tastier than another brand of bean based chips that I tried and rejected.The salt flavor is my favorite,but I also like Pico de Gallo.
These chips are so tasty!They are great with guacamole,and super yummy by themselves.My kids and I love them!
Used for my baby shower treats and they were a hit!
An RKT junkie dream, jeez,I need an Intervention!
Package came with a rip in the foil
Mom took to work Party.It was a hit.Gone in an hour.

I really like this dip poured over cream cheese for the holidays served with crackers and I have purchased it before,but I refuse to pay $10 for shipping.I will be finding something else to take it is place.I do not believe shipping would be that much.Come down on your shipping and I will be a customer again.
I buy mesquite grilled chicken in the frozen section of Sams and put this on top and put in toaster oven and it is GREAT!
Great dip!!!
good quality product and taste.the taste is more sweet than salty.the habanero gives it a mild flavor overall a good dip to use on chips or for cooking
I recently moved from CA to SC I was unable to find it anywhere here!So happy I found it on amazon!It is my favorite salsa with Santa Fe chilies and No Onions!!Yummy!!
Love this and NO onions!Makes it even better.
I love this salsa,and the local grocery stores are not carrying it anymore.Glad I could find a way to order it online for a reasonable price.The medium salsa has a pretty good bite.
Notice that although the picture has 3 jars of salsa,you only get one jar of salsa.It is not made clear in the product description,which is annoying.
The taste is awesome.
Miss these!Not sold in Oregon.Delivered in just a few days...fresh and so good!!!

The cakes expiration date was 5 days away.I contacted tastycake and they advised me that the expiration is approx 3 weeks from date produced.In my local store the expiration date was over 2 weeks away.
tastes like home
Excellent product delivered promptly.
Great,but hard to find...
Thank goodness for Amazon,daughter was driving me crazy.Rebecca is lactose intolerant and only certain foods she can have.We live in an area that no longer carries them.Thanks again...Her mom
just as expected with longer expiration than I get in store
